article.title: Raytheon to Provide Super Hornet Radar Systems
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Co., El Segundo, Calif., is being awarded an $8,640,000 firm-fixed-price delivery order against a previously issued basic ordering agreement for the procurement of three AN/APG-79 Active Electronically Scanned Array Radar Systems in support of the F/A-18 E/F aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Md., is the contracting activity.
